attributes.action: Ban all Islamic practice in England
attributes.additional_details:
Hundreds and thousands of people in the UK disagree with Islam belief.

It is a form of legal terrorism, they kill animals in the 'Halal' way, which means The animals suffer immense pain right up until death - which is also illegal here in the UK and EU, as the animals must be pre-stunned to prevent pain.

They are changing OUR way of life, including Halal into nearly every single town or city in England.

Some, but not all practice extreme radicalism and terrorism in our city centres, and even have tight knit communities where the white man is untraceable.

They flood our Catholic schools, CATHOLIC, not Islamic, not Muslim.

Drummer Lee Rigby died for 'Allah', after protecting his Queen & Country.

Many white-British civilians don't speak their language, and sometimes when you're out in public, you can hear conversation, but not one English word.

If they want to practice their beliefs, FAIR ENOUGH, no problem, just do it in your own country where it's legal.
